issue.title: [CF 1550] State of warning for 'icon is invalid' changed in BFA?
issue.body:
Before you used to get a chat warning after opening config for an invalid icon checked by a meta icon when it was ACTUALLY invalid (for example, the aura was deleted but the referral on the meta icon wasn't removed). Now it counts as invalid if the meta icon is simply empty. Technically it's right but...

 

https://i.imgur.com/tkSAaiW.jpg pic example.

 

Icons are empty because it's new expansion so rehauling auras. It's not a HUGE deal but it's a slight annoyance and definitely a changed behavior from previous versions, and going into the future might hit me with mild annoyances via false invalid icons, even if it'll take seconds to check.

 

tl;dr not really sure if intended or not?


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #1550 | Raw

comments.body:
Don't think its changed at all, but I'll remove the warning for unconfigured slots anyway.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
